thread.title: Scarlett Moffatt in shock split with boyfriend Luke Croddenafter a year-long romance
thread.title_full: Scarlett Moffatt in shock split with boyfriend Luke Croddenafter a year-long romance

title: Scarlett Moffatt in shock split with boyfriend Luke Croddenafter a year-long romance
text:
ITS OVER Scarlett Moffatt splits from boyfriend Luke Crodden after a year-long romance 
The I’m A Celeb winner is said to be ‘sad’ about their split but wants to stay friends Exclusive By Lauren Franklin, Showbiz Reporter 3rd February 2017, 9:25 am Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments SCARLETT Moffatt and Luke Crodden have split up weeks after a year-long romance, The Sun Online can exclusively reveal. 
The 26-year-old was in a relationship with Luke , 28, for a year, and after winning I’m A Celebrity in December revealed that she planned to marry and have children with him. Social Media 7 Scarlett Moffatt and Luke Crodden have ended their year-long relationship 
But her life has become a whirlwind since her jungle triumph and the pair have struggled to make time for each other. 
A source close to the couple has said there is absolutely no bad blood, adding: “Scarlett is sad about her break up with Luke but she really hopes they can remain friends. 
“It’s a positive thing that Scarlett’s schedule is so busy at the moment as it will take her mind off the split.” 
Scarlett became a telly favourite during her stint on Gogglebox, but since being crowned queen of the jungle at the end of last year her popularity has soared to a whole new level. Social Media 7 The pair moved to London together in December 
No one could have predicted how dramatically her life would change and it has given her a fresh perspective on things. 
“At the moment she needs to concentrate on her career. After all, she’s got plenty of time to settle down in the future.” Instagram 7 Scarlett has seen her profile soar since winning I’m A Celebrity Get Me Out Of Here before Christmas 
Not only is her fitness DVD soaring up the charts, she has also signed a lucrative contract with Channel Four which will see her resurrect Davina McCall’s Streetmate and film a pilot for a chat show with Alan Carr. 
Over on ITV the fun-loving young star will be working alongside Ant and Dec on their show Saturday Night Takeaway, which she describes as an “absolute dream.” Instagram 7 Their split will come as a shock to fans as they always looked loved-up in pictures together and gushed about each other online 
The split will come as a shock to those close to them, as in December the couple moved from Newcastle to London’s busy Camden to start their next chapter. 
Only last week Luke accompanied her to the National Television Awards where her shared a loved-up snap of them on his Instagram. INSTAGRAM Luke shared this selfie of them at the NTAs last week RELATED STORIES 'We wish only the best for each other' Kylie Minogue confirms split from Joshua Sasse and thanks fans for their 'support' WELCOME BREAK New-mum Stephanie Davis is preparing to jet off on her first holiday with baby son Caben-Albi DID YOU SPOT THIS? Celebrity Big Brother fans are convinced the old diary room chair from series three made a comeback in last night's episode THE SHOW WILL GO ON If you're a Celine Dion fan the time has finally come as tickets are on sale TODAY PRETTY IN PINK Bra-less Dakota Johnson takes the plunge in an eye-popping pink gown at the Fifty Shades premiere sealed with a kiss Marta Milans seen in a steamy clinch as she is linked to Kylie Minogue's ex-fiance Joshua Sasse BED HEAD Katie Price shares a video of herself naked in bed with husband Kieran Hayer to promote her new perfume KILLER WOMAN Meet Marta Milans, the Spanish actress and friend of Kylie Minogue's former fiancé Joshua Sasse Howay man Who is Luke Crodden? Scarlett Moffatt's boyfriend and now Gogglebox star - here's what we know SLIPPERY SLOPE The Jump's Spencer Matthews 'caught in love triangle' with co-stars Vogue Williams and Jade Jones 'IT'S GETTING WARM IN HERE' CBB stars Nicola McLean and Bianca Gascoigne pucker up for a kiss as they get close hours before grand final I SHOULD BE SO LUCKY After Kylie's split, we take a look back over her love life from Jason Donovan to Olivier Martinez Getty Images The breakup comes as Scarlett’s TV career goes from strength to strength 
7 They had even discussed baby names and gushed about their future together 
The exes revealed in December that they were even discussing baby names. Scarlett told OK! magazine: “We’ve had a baby name chat!” 
And Luke added: “She wants to call our little girl Aurora!” 
Explaining why the moniker appeals, Scarlett said: “Like the Northern Lights… and because it’s the name of the Princess out of Sleeping Beauty!” I'm A Celebrity winner Scarlett Moffatt's boyfriend can't speak through his tears 
A friend of the star says she meant every word at the time, adding: "Scarlet was very much in love with Luke and still cares for him deelpy. She didn't say any of those things lightly, but people have to remember she is still very young."
